ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Not sure, but here's my guess for the new 45th leve l song
ygData.msgSnippet: Does it last a pathetic amount of time like the last charm song? Or does it stick for longer now? This was one thing that annoyed me about our charm song, the
ygData.messageBody:
Does it last a pathetic amount of time like the last charm song? Or does it
stick for longer now? This was one thing that annoyed me about our charm
song, the fact that it only lasts a few seconds you feel like you don't
have enough power over the mob you are charming. Would be nice if we could
have a pet for 30 seconds or so.....

Madagan songweaver, 1.5 bubs from 45 <Guardians of Light>
Veeshan




Greg Gillan <ggillan@...> on 12/04/2000 15:55:07

Please respond to eqbards@egroups.com

To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Not sure, but here's my guess for the new 45th leve
l song




Not sure what level it caps at, but its higher than 49. I charmed a level
50 ice giant last night.


Elwyn



<snip>
Anyone else notice that we're going to need ANOTHER charm upgrade somewhere
in the 50's? 39th will only take us to 49th level npc's.

Lyrnia
<snip>
